name: Phylactery Finder
description:
Play as the brave hero looking to take down the evil lich. The lich's soul is hidden in a random nick nack and it's up to you to find the real Phylactery and destroy it, killing the lich. Race against the clock and enemies as you wander through the liches lair.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello, hope this game is enjoyable. 

We would love to hear thoughts down in the comments as it's always good to hear feedback or even just see that people actually played. (Also sorry for not having a webGL version this time around, it broke at the last minute R.I.P)
